name: contumacious quest
description:
The game must be played in fullscreen!

Controls:

WASD - Move.

Space - Speed up the game.

R - Reset Level.

Step on the red button to let the AI control your robot.

Credits:

Programming - Guy Geva and Orad E

Artwork - Shay S (Trees taken from Kenny's Game Assets)

Puzzles - Or Yedidia
